reference.title: GET /ariel/searches/{search_id}
reference.shortdesc: Retrieves information about an Ariel search.

refsyn.p: Retrieve status information for a search, based on the search ID parameter. The same informational fields are returned regardless of whether the search is in progress or is complete.

entry.p: Required. The identifier for an Ariel search.
Optional. Specify 'wait=N' where N is number of seconds to wait for COMPLETED status of the search.
The search information was retrieved with 'Prefer: wait=N' timeout(sec) expired before the search is completed
A request parameter is not valid.
An error occurred during the attempt to retrieve the search information.
The Ariel server might be temporarily unavailable or offline. Please try again later.

refsyn.title: Response Description
refsyn.p: Information about the specified search, including the search status.
